ingredients.ingredient: 8 bamboo skewers, soaked in water for 20 minutes

cookingTips: Soak bamboo skewers in water to prevent burning during cooking
Cook bacon until mostly crispy but still pliable for easier rolling
Wrap bacon around prunes and thread onto skewers for even cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through assembling this traditional Spanish appetizer and explain the sweet-savory flavor combination.
